simplified: 由俭入奢易，由奢入俭难

pronunciation.pinyin: yóu jiǎn rù shē yì , yóu shē rù jiǎn nán
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: you2 jian3 ru4 she1 yi4 , you2 she1 ru4 jian3 nan2

details.simplified: 由俭入奢易，由奢入俭难
details.traditional: 由儉入奢易，由奢入儉難

meanings.value: it is easy to go from frugality to extravagance; the reverse is not so easy
